name: Jumptag Club: Wearable Tech & Fashion Pilot
description: A fashion-integrated wearable tech project led by Rito, combining physical jewelry, dynamic QR code routing, and hybrid mobile app development. Jumptag Club was featured at New York Fashion Week and merged real-time UX, creative branding, and full-stack platform design into a forward-thinking digital identity experience.

mainEntity.name: Jumptag Club
mainEntity.description: A limited-run wearable tech concept blending physical jewelry with dynamic QR code destinations, built by Rito and showcased at New York Fashion Week. The project included a hybrid mobile app, Shopify storefront, and was worn by models from Vogue and Harper’s Bazaar-featured designers.

hasPart.name: Let's Get Phygital
hasPart.description: An EDM parody track created by Rito as a brand expression for Jumptag Club — a remix of 'Physical' celebrating phygital identity culture.
